From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

OOC: Time for the rest of my characters to hear!

BIC: "Arise, Optimus Prime!" Was the line, and it had echoes throughout the
world. Everyone heard it, so...

Plintissa knew that Optimus Prime was supposed to be good, but chances are
he'll find some excuse to ridicule and torment her anyway, because she was
herself, someone that nobody seemed to like.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Diskus heard the line, and thought: Floppy disk, indeed to it, Op Op Opo
Ippo Primin! Mr. Buzz, Diskus know because of smartness! Heehee!
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Burning Hammer heard and knew that his time for glory was near. If he could
find Optimus Prime, he would kill him, and then all would be forced to bow
before him! He would be the savior of the Alliance! Maybe Zardus would place
him in an exalted position, give him command over all of the troops,
anything could happen! He daydreamed about it and accidentally broke off one
of his fingers.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gotron hears the line. He thinks about Optimus Prime and the danger the
Alliance might be in, but dispells any thoughts that the Alliance would be
defeated very quickly.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deemos hears it. He thinks to himself: Optimus Prime. The Autobot leader.
Perhaps...No! I musn't think about him, there are ALOT of more important
things to attend to right now, like my domination over all, screw Optimus
Prime. Still, it is something indeed that he has returned...
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rizopas: Did you hear that?

Doom Ice: Nope, let's keep going.

Rizopas: WHAT? You can't tell me you didn't hear that!

Doom Ice: Haha, sorry.

Rizopas: Hmm...
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shokaract hears. The Mob hears too, but stays quiet.

Shokaract: No! Optimus Prime? Why is he here? Does he want to kill me? I'll
have to kill him first, keep a lookout, Mob.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Airbomber: Shut up Optimsu Prime! You not hearing me essa? Shut up! Geez!
Some people are rude, man.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instrat: Fancy that, Optimus Prime.

Arrow: I would love to make him SQUEAL.

Train Wreck: Yeah, me too, but don't take him lightly, Arrow, we took
Stronghold and Blender lightly.

Arrow: SQUEEEEEAL! Haha!
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Perplex heard the Optimus Prime thing. He understood what it meant, but
didn't care. He went straight to the injured bot, picked him up, and walked
off back towards the base, kicking a piece of Serge out of his way.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

----- Original Message -----
From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 28, 2001 1:50 AM
Subject: Drastic times (Rdahl is writing this)


> OOC: I (Robert Dahl) am posting from rAuq's place cause i'm
> staying the night.
>
> Motormaster's jaw hung open at he new message of Prime's
> awakening. "Doesn't that junk piece ever stay dead?" Motormaster
> spat harshly. If his eyes could have shown emotion they would
> have been burning with rage. "This could screw up everything
> 'Blast." Turning to Killfest he started up again, his voice hollow and
> devoid of emotion. "We need to go to the Ark NOW. Will you join
> us on the trip? You can prove you're worth as an ally." He was now
> waiting for a reply.
>
>
> On 28 Jan 2001, at 4:40, Zardus wrote:
>
> > ::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Greven::
> >
> > Killfest listens to the voice that announced Optimus Prime's return,
> > showing no surprise or any other emotion. It didn't matter to him.
> > Optimus Prime could arise if he wanted.
> >
> > He looked at Motormaster, waiting for the bot to speak.
>
>
>
>
>
>
